synopsis.text:
Only after emerging victorious against Geese Howard, the renowned fighter Terry Bogard finds himself facing a formidable German opponent, Wolfgang Krauser. Demoralized by a crushing defeat, Terry spirals into a life of aimless wandering and alcohol. When all hope seems lost, a young boy named Tony steps in to inspire Terry to overcome his fears and face Krauser once more.

Based on the classic Neo Geo SNK game, Fatal Fury 2, our hero Terry Bogard grapples with the aftermath of a devastating loss to the seemingly invincible Wolfgang Krauser. Haunted by the defeat, Terry's life takes a downward turn until an unlikely ally in the form of a young boy helps him find the strength to face his fears and seek redemption in a high-stakes rematch. Can Terry rise to the challenge and reclaim his title as a legendary fighter?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
